articles.description: Marvel Studios brought footage, a few big MCU announcements and more to Disney’s D23 Expo. But there are still lots of unanswered questions.
articles.content:
And yetthere was a lot that was missing from the Marvel D23 dog-and-pony show, and a lot of questions still to be answered about the full scope of Phases 5 and 6. Lets take a look:
